channel.title: Release single collaboration or wait
channel.description:
So I have something special in the works for everyone.
MARBLED GLASS was meant to be my last single before this. though this could be a while.
I would like to release a line of collaborations with artists who would be interested; with a few in the works already.
please tell me your thoughts of what you would like to hear and whether you’d wait or have some singles thrown in to fill up the space.

item.title: Release single collaboration or wait
item.dc:creator: Xiejra
item.description:
oh yeah i forgot about remixes! yeah i’ll space stuff out from now on. aswell as BTC’s aswell

Read full topic

item.title: Release single collaboration or wait
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
I’d recommend shooting for a time between a week or two weeks for a given song or collaboration or even remix to be released, it all depends on what you feel most comfortable with

Read full topic

item.title: Release single collaboration or wait
item.dc:creator: Xiejra
item.description:
yeah thanks. think i release stuff a lot slower than what i have been

Read full topic

item.title: Release single collaboration or wait
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
I’d say collaborations are just as important as releasing singles on a schedule. Just my two cents xD they should be considered part of the schedule in that way

Read full topic
